mosinstall.name: Newest RSG Images
mosinstall.author: Chef Groovy
mosinstall.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description: Module to display newest image in each gallery. Loosely based on Johans version of RSItems. Newest beta version on the SVN at http://joomlacode.org/svn/rsgallery2/com_rsgallery2_legacy/extra/extensions/mod_cg_newimages/

param.name: DisplayRows
param.label: Rows to Display. Two per row.

param.name: InsertedCode
param.label: Code to Insert
param.description: Google Adwords or other HTML Code block to insert in image list

param.name: CodeAfterRow
param.label: Row to insert code after
param.description: What row to insert code block after. Zero for disabled.
